channel.title: Sprout Distro
channel.description: Anarchist zine distro with PDF zines and pamphlets on anarchism, direct action, tactics, etc.

item.title: Anarchist Zines & Pamphlets Published in November 2023
item.description: A collection of anarchist zines released in November 2023. Zines cover Palestine, anarchist history, anti-police rebellion, protests, and liberal co-optation. All zines in PDF format.

item.title: Anarchist Zines & Pamphlets Published in October 2023
item.description: A collection of anarchist zines released in Octoberr 2023. Topics include Palestine, Artificial Intelligence, surveillance, critiques of Tiqqun, and various anarchist news. All zines in PDF format.

item.title: Anarchist Zines & Pamphlets Published in September 2023
item.description: Anarchist zines released in September 2023. Topics include anti-fascism, the Stop Copy City movement, anarchist history, and more. All zines in PDF format.

item.title: Anarchist Zines & Pamphlets Published in August 2023
item.description: Anarchist zines released in August 2023. Topics include anti-fascism, digital security, anarchist history, and more. All zines in PDF format.

item.title: Turn Off Your Phone
item.description: A beginner level introduction to digital security for anarchists and other radicals.

item.title: Threat Library
item.description: An extensive resource examining the surveillance tactics used by the government against anarchists. Regularly updated!

item.title: June 11: A History
item.description: A history of the June 11 Day of Solidarity with Long-term Anarchist Prisoners.

item.title: How to Start Your Own Study Group in Prison
item.description: A guide to starting a study group in prison.

item.title: Practical Abolition from the Inside Out
item.description: A collection of reflections from a prisoner solidarity project in Hamilton, ON, Canada.

item.title: Defend Pride
item.description: A guide with suggestions on how to organize to protect pride events in an era of increased anti-queer attacks.
